title: Woodstock: 3 days of peace & music (S) (Director's cut) [Widescreen]

description: Winner of the Best Documentary Feature at the 1970 Academy Awards, director Michael Wadleigh's film captures the spirit of Woodstock- three days of peace and music. Included on the tape are performances from the following artists: Crosby, Stills and Nash, Canned Heat, Richie Havens, Joan Baez, The Who, Sha-Na-Na, Joe Cocker and the Grease Band, Country Joe and the Fish, Arlo Guthrie, Ten Years After, Jefferson Airplane, John Sebastian, Country Joe McDonald, Santana, Sly and the Family Stone, Janis Joplin and Jimi Hendrix.
